full_output.summary: Passionate computer science engineering student proficient in Python, C++, Web Development, and Data Science.

projects.name: Analysis and Detection of Seizures Using EEG Signal
projects.description: Conducted advanced EEG signal analysis using time-domain, frequency-domain, and Wavelet Transform feature extraction methods. Implemented Random Forest algorithms for seizure classification from a comprehensive EEG dataset. Developed machine learning-based diagnostic tools to enhance epilepsy management and provide clinical insights.

projects.name: Dynamic Price Optimization
projects.description: Developed a dynamic pricing optimization system using various machine learning models. Implemented a Stacked Ensemble Meta Model to enhance prediction accuracy. Leveraged data analytics to optimize revenue streams, operational efficiency, and customer experience.

experiences.description: Developed a product price comparison website using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and PHP. Integrated APIs from e-commerce platforms for real-time product information and price tracking.
Developed a Mental Fitness Tracker using machine learning to predict mental fitness levels. Provided users with visualizations to track and understand mental health trends.

Analyzed the Titanic dataset using machine learning to understand passenger survival factors. Deployed on AWS and Docker with CI/CD pipeline; currently working on live speech-to-text conversions. Currently working on real-time speech-to-text conversions using an open-source library.
